radiographic_examinations.findings: The gallbladder is distended with equivocal wall edema. There is cholelithiasis and small amount of gallbladder sludge. There is a 1.8 cm gallbladder neck stone which was not movable on realtime scanning and on decubitus positioning, suggesting impaction. There is no intra- or extra-hepatic biliary ductal dilation. The CBD measures 1.3 mm. There is no pericholecystic fluid with the gallbladder wall measuring 2 mm. However, some of the images suggest there may be edema in the gallbladder wall.
